body: @josharian - Caching stack address is harder than I thought due to the value's type in most cases being a unique instance of a Type.  I started looking at caching types in Ptrto() to solve this, but the Node's type is unique there as well.  The easy cases are args to runtime arguments which are all given type Types[TUINTPTR].  Past that I don't see a great way to reduce the OpOffPtr values.
